attributes.action: abolish the proposal to allow the HMRC to automatically deduct unpaid taxes from bank accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The HMRC is proposing that it should be allowed to automatically deduct unpaid taxes from bank accounts without a court order.  This takes all control away from the legal system, and places it in the hands of the HMRC.  

According to the BBC: "The plan would allow HMRC to bypass the need to get a court order to seize money."

Surely this is infringing on human rights, and also invading both our privacy and security.  We are already taxed up to the hilt, we don't need to be left open to any more taxation!
